plugins.name: project-spec
plugins.description: Generate project, feature, and design specifications with a single /spec-writing command. Features adaptive routing, gap analysis, design audit, and codebase-aware interviews.

plugins.name: suno-composer
plugins.description: Creative or guided workflow for composing Suno AI songs. Vision-first mode (Claude proposes, you react) or guided mode (step-by-step wizard). Features narrative style prompts, 29 artist profiles, J-pop tier presets, adaptive preference learning, Chrome integration, album mode, variations, song continuations, plus walkthroughs and troubleshooting guides.

plugins.name: kana-code-rpc
plugins.description: Display Claude Code activity as Discord Rich Presence. Shows project name, current tool activity, model, token usage, cost, and git branch. Features multi-session daemon, idle detection, MCP tool support, and YAML configuration with hot-reload.
